title: First Vehicles With Next-Generation Apple CarPlay Announced Ahead of 2024 Launch
content:
Aston Martin and Porsche today previewed the first vehicle dashboards with support for Apple's next-generation CarPlay experience, which launches in 2024, according to a Car and Driver report spotted by Bloomberg's Mark Gurman.


Apple said next-generation CarPlay offers deeper integration with vehicle functions like climate controls and FM radio, support for multiple displays across the dashboard, increased personalization, and more.

The next-generation CarPlay interface has a customizable design that is tailored to a specific vehicle and automaker's brand identity.
